summary: Full Stack Developer with 3+ years of experience building scalable web applications using .NET, React, and Azure cloud services. Proven track record in microservices architecture, DevOps practices, and leading technical teams. Passionate about clean code, performance optimization, and delivering high-quality solutions.

experience.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Led development of microservices architecture using .NET Core and Azure Service Bus
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps, reducing deployment time by 60%
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews for a team of 8 developers
Optimized database queries resulting in 40% improvement in application performance
Collaborated with product managers to define technical requirements and project timelines

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Developed responsive web applications using React, TypeScript, and Material-UI
Built RESTful APIs using .NET Core and Entity Framework with SQL Server
Implemented authentication and authorization using JWT and OAuth 2.0
Integrated third-party payment systems and external APIs
Participated in Agile development processes and daily standups

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.name: E-Commerce Platform
description: Built a scalable e-commerce platform handling 10k+ concurrent users
Implemented real-time inventory management using SignalR and Redis
Integrated payment gateways and shipping APIs
Achieved 99.9% uptime using Azure Application Insights and monitoring

projects.name: Task Management System
description: Developed real-time collaborative task management application
Implemented drag-and-drop functionality using React DnD
Deployed on AWS using Docker containers and ECS

skills.languages: C#, JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, SQL, HTML/CSS
skills.frameworks: .NET Core, React, Node.js, Express.js, Entity Framework, Bootstrap
